text: Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas! Everyone, c'mon and climb aboard the Magical Christmas
Train! Ho Ho Ho!
It's a magical train that only appears on cold winter nights one day of the year. It helps
Santa Clause deliver the toys to all of the girls and all of the boys.
It's a Magical Christmas Train. It's a Magical Christmas Train. It's a Magical Christmas
Train, and it's headed to you right now.
As you travel through the ice and the wind and the cold it carries the dreams of the young
and the old. It stops at your front door on Christmas Eve,
but only appears to those who believe.

Here they come... huffing and puffing on down the line! It's Lots and Lots of Toy Trains!
Two of the greatest Toy Train DVDs we've ever offered! And now, through this special TV
offer, you'll get 2 DVDs for the price of one! You'll get to see Holiday Trains, Spooky
Trains, Alphabet, Counting, and Guarded Railway Trains. Even trains that you can ride!
There's toy trains of every shape and size! Plus, little brick trains and much, much more
when you order Lots and Lots of Toy Trains! Each DVD is jam-packed with lots of fun sing-
along songs and close-up model railroad action! As a special bonus, you'll also see real,
live steam trains in action! This offer is not available in stores! So get 2 DVDs for the price
of one! Get Lots and Lots of Toy Trains! Order now and receive a free CD of Toy Train
songs! Visit our website lotsoftrains.com or call 1-888-300-3455.
